author: terrill37
body:
#### PR description:
Changes include monitoring of DeepCSV variables in the BTVHLTOfflineSource plugin along with removing unnecessary variable monitoring. Also introduced a tag and probe plugin producing output to the HLT/BTV directory path to the output DQM directory.

#### PR validation:

performed the following test using `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` in lxplus.

[bjetTnP_update_v3.pptx](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/8637026/bjetTnP_update_v3.pptx)
title: BTV Updates
